user.title: V2C Cloud
user.description: Enter your V2C Cloud API key. You can generate it from https://v2c.cloud/home/user.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate V2C Cloud
reauth_confirm.description: The API key is no longer valid. Please enter a new key.

error.invalid_api_key: The provided API key is not valid.

set_wifi_credentials.name: Update Wi-Fi credentials
set_wifi_credentials.description: Configure the Wi-Fi SSID and password for a charger.

program_timer.name: Configure charging timer
program_timer.description: Set start/end time and activation status for one of the device timers.

register_rfid.name: Register RFID card
register_rfid.description: Enable card registration mode with the supplied label.

add_rfid_card.name: Add RFID card manually
add_rfid_card.description: Register an RFID card by providing its UID and display name.

delete_rfid.name: Delete RFID card
delete_rfid.description: Remove a registered RFID card from the device.

set_charge_stop_energy.name: Set energy stop
set_charge_stop_energy.description: Stop charging automatically after delivering a given amount of energy.

set_charge_stop_minutes.name: Set time stop
set_charge_stop_minutes.description: Stop charging automatically after the specified number of minutes.

start_charge_for_energy.name: Start charge for energy
start_charge_for_energy.description: Start a charging session that will end after reaching the energy target.

start_charge_for_minutes.name: Start charge for time
start_charge_for_minutes.description: Start a charging session that will end after the specified duration.

trigger_update.name: Trigger firmware update
trigger_update.description: Ask the charger to search and install available firmware updates.

set_ocpp_enabled.name: Toggle OCPP
set_ocpp_enabled.description: Enable or disable the OCPP functionality.

set_ocpp_id.name: Set OCPP charge point ID
set_ocpp_id.description: Configure the charge point identifier used in OCPP sessions.

set_ocpp_address.name: Set OCPP server address
set_ocpp_address.description: Configure the remote OCPP server URL.

set_inverter_ip.name: Set inverter IP
set_inverter_ip.description: Configure the IP address of the linked inverter.

scan_wifi_networks.name: Scan Wi-Fi networks
scan_wifi_networks.description: Trigger a Wi-Fi scan and emit the list of visible networks as an event.

update_power_profile.name: Update power profile
update_power_profile.description: Update an existing personalised power profile (v2).

get_power_profile.name: Get power profile
get_power_profile.description: Retrieve a personalised power profile using its timestamp.

list_power_profiles.name: List power profiles
list_power_profiles.description: Retrieve all personalised power profiles for a device.

get_device_statistics.name: Get device statistics
get_device_statistics.description: Retrieve charging statistics for a specific device.

get_global_statistics.name: Get global statistics
get_global_statistics.description: Retrieve aggregated charging statistics for the account.
